about_the_game:
"Horror Family - Flight" is a loop-based horror game set on an airplane and is the first installment in the Horror Family series.

Story: The protagonist (Mitsuo Nakamura) falls asleep on a plane on his way back from a business trip.
And when he wakes up...

Gameplay: This game is a loop-based horror game.

Immersion: The game screen flickers with noise, intensifying the horror.

Play Time: It can be completed in about 20 minutes.

Developer's Anecdote: Developed single-handedly by a 15-year-old.

Notice:The title has been changed from “Grudge Murder” to “Horror Family”.

Video Distribution Guidelines:
Individuals and corporations alike are free to post, broadcast, and monetize on social media and other platforms without prior notice. However, since we have used the service "Ondoku-san" for the voice readings in the game, due to copyright reasons, please either display the end credits in the video or, if that is not possible,please credit "© in the description section of social media and video posting sites.
Also, please understand that we cannot be held responsible for any damages arising from the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.
